name: To. The. Top
description:
This is a game about consistency. The jumps are not hard, but there are a lot of them.

This is a game about climbing a tower.

This is a game that is bad.

Use the arrows keys to move and space to jump

I made this game in 6 hours and it is about as good as a game made in 6 hours. 

This is also the first game I have ever made. Please tell me in the comments if this is good. P.S. The first five levels are especially boring and I am bad a texturing.
